original_text: have brought this on you, because you lusted after the nations and defiled yourself with their idols.
korean_text: 네가 이같이 당할 것은 네가 음란하게 이방을 따르고 그 우상들로 더럽혔기 때문이로다

sentences.original_text: I have brought this on you
because you lusted after the nations
and defiled yourself with their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 우상으로 네 자신을 더럽혔다
